sentence.Network_en: Her search for love has often caused her excruciating misery and loneliness.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对爱情的寻觅常常给她带来极大的痛苦和孤独感。

sentence.Network_en: I was in excruciating pain and one leg wouldn't move.
sentence.Network_cn: 我忍受着剧痛，一条腿无法动弹。
同时，又无聊得让人苦恼不已。

entry.tran: 极痛苦的;折磨人的;剧痛的
entry.def: If you describe something as excruciating, you are emphasizing that it is extremely painful, either physically or emotionally.

example.ex: I was in excruciating pain and one leg wouldn't move...
example.tran: 我忍受着剧痛，一条腿无法动弹。

example.ex: Her search for love has often caused her excruciating misery and loneliness.
example.tran: 她对爱情的寻觅常常给她带来极大的痛苦和孤独感。

entry.tran: 难以忍受的;令人苦恼的
entry.def: If you describe something as excruciating, you mean that it is very unpleasant to experience, for example because it is very boring or embarrassing.

example.tran: 同时，又无聊得让人苦恼不已。

example.ex: There was a moment of excruciating silence.
example.tran: 一时间安静得令人难以忍受。

auth_sentence.content: She is in excruciating pain all the time.

auth_sentence.content: The simple act of standing up was excruciating.
auth_sentence.res_content: The simple act of standing up was excruciating.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The simple act of standing up was excruciating.

sentences.en: The tablets brought temporary respite from the excruciating pain.
sentences.cn: 这些药片暂时缓解了剧痛。
